awards:
第76届戛纳电影节(2023)
　　影评人周单元  短片发现奖(提名)
introduction: Do not adjust your receivers. The characters in Crocodile, which premiered at Cannes, really communicate primarily through screams. The language of shouting, however, turns out to be surprisingly rich and depending on the situation can signify an outburst of anger, a testament to powerlessness, a cry for help, and sometimes all of these at once. In Dawid Bodzak's world, nothing can be one hundred percent certain because dark fantasies become increasingly difficult to distinguish from equally disturbing reality with each passing moment.源自：https://www.nowehoryzonty.pl/vod-film.s?id=12972
